_header: A sovereign beauty over all thee leave
_description: On the virtue of a well-bridled tongue — one couplet

Banna.Transcription:
a souerane bewty our all the laifa weill brydillit tung to
                    haif
Banna.Note:
Follows 835 as
                    if part of same text.
Banna.Facsimiles:
Fox,  Denton,  and  William A. Ringler.  
             The Bannatyne Manuscript: National Library of Scotland Advocates’
                MS. 1.1.6
         London: Scolar Press, in Association with The National Library of
            Scotland, 1980.
